name: Pradip K. Srimani
content: Pradip K Srimani, Clemson University Pradip K Srimani, IEEE Life Fellow, ACM Distinguished Scientist, Professor Fax: (864) 656-0145 Voice: (864) 656-5886 Office: 116 McAdams Hall Office Hours: by appointment Research Interests Parallel and Distributed Computing, Interconnection Networks, Self-Stabilizing Systems, Graph Theory Applications, Mobile Computing. Research Publications: IEEE Xplore Digital Library, DBLP Bibliography Server, Google Scholar Current Professional Activities · Program Committee, APDCM 2018, CanadaR’19 · Program Committee, GPC-2018 – 13th International Conference on Green, Pervasive and Cloud Computing, Hangzhou, China. · Program Committee, IEEE BigMM 2016, 2019 · Program Committee, ICIT 2016 · Program Committee, IEEE ICSC 2017, · Program Committee, PECCS 2018, PECCS 2019,  PECCS 2020,The 2018 IEEE / WIC / ACM International Conferences on Web Intelligence, WI-IAT 2020 · Editorial Board, International Journal of High Performance Computing and Networking, 2012 – 2018 · Editorial Board, Journal of Big Data, Springer, 2013 – Past Professional Activities Teaching Assignments Fall 2021: 3120_F22, 8380_F22 My Complete Vita
